translated: one should associate with the highest person;
One should stand in his advice,
Having boarded a small piece of wood,
just as one would sink in the great ocean;
In the same way, having come to the lazy,
even one who lives well sinks;
the lazy one of low energy.
With the noble ones who are secluded,
with those who are resolute and meditative;
Always with those who have aroused energy,
one should live with the wise.â€
